incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failure and Delays to Multiple Networks in Malaysia

incident_updates.body: Twilio Network was degraded for 110 minutes between 13:20 and 15:10 Pacific Time on 17/10/2024. During this period of time, customers may have experienced delivery failure and delays to multiple networks in Malaysia. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: 500s Errors Enqueuing and Dequeuing Calls Using TwiML and API in Programmable Voice

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Voice was degraded for 3 minutes between 14:50 and 14:53 Pacific Time on 10/17/2024. During this period of time, customers may have experienced multiple 500s errors enqueuing and dequeuing calls using TwiML and API. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Programmable Voice. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
